languages.text: "Иеронимус Скорбный, ты повинен в смертях и страданиях, ты повинен в покушении на членов династии Чорда. Но я не вижу скверны в твоей душе, а потому не вправе тебя судить. Судить тебя будет Император. Я назначаю тебе испытание веры — в ходе недавнего теракта, совершенного пособниками Токары, были повреждены коммуникации центрального атриума".

traits.locale_text: "Иеронимус Скорбный, ты повинен в смертях и страданиях, ты повинен в покушении на членов династии Чорда. Но я не вижу скверны в твоей душе, а потому не вправе тебя судить. Судить тебя будет Император. Я назначаю тебе испытание веры — в ходе недавнего теракта, совершенного пособниками Токары, были повреждены коммуникации центрального атриума".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."
languages.original_text: "Иеронимус Скорбный, ты повинен в смертях и страданиях, ты повинен в покушении на членов династии Чорда. Но я не вижу скверны в твоей душе, а потому не вправе тебя судить. traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索，你犯下了罪行，你造成了死亡与痛苦，你杀害了库尔达家族的成员。然而，我在你的灵魂中看不到腐化的迹象，因此我也无权审判你，就由帝皇来审判你吧。我可以给你指派一个任务。最近，托卡拉的追随者发动了恐怖袭击，中庭的支撑系统遭到了破坏。”
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."

traits.locale_text: “希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索，你犯下了嘴型，你造成了死亡与痛苦，你杀害了库尔达家族的成员。然而，我在你的灵魂中看不到腐化的迹象，因此我也无权审判你，就由帝皇来审判你吧。我可以给你指派一个任务。最近，托卡拉的追随者发动了恐怖袭击，中庭的支撑系统遭到了破坏。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ。お前は死と苦しみを引き起こし、チョーダ家の者を暗殺した。しかしお前の魂は腐敗しておらず、私にお前を裁く権利はない。よって、お前は皇帝に裁かれる事になった。お前には信仰の行為を課す。中央アトリウムの支援システムは、トカラの信者による最近のテロ攻撃で損傷している」
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ。お前は死と苦しみを引き起こし、チョーダ家の者を暗殺した。しかしお前の魂は腐敗しておらず、私にお前を裁く権利はない。よって、お前は皇帝に裁かれる事になった。お前には信仰の行為を課す。中央アトリウムの支援システムは、トカラの信者による最近のテロ攻撃で損傷している」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Hieronymus Doloroso, es usted culpable de causar muerte y sufrimiento por el asesinato de miembros de la casa Chorda. Sin embargo, no veo corrupción en su alma, por lo que no tengo derecho a juzgarle, así que será juzgado por el Emperador. Le voy a asignar un acto de fe. Los sistemas de apoyo del atrio central fueron dañados en un reciente ataque terrorista de los seguidores de Tocara».
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."

traits.locale_text: «Hieronymus Doloroso, es usted culpable de causar muerte y sufrimiento por el asesinato de miembros de la casa Chorda. Sin embargo, no veo corrupción en su alma, por lo que no tengo derecho a juzgarle, así que será juzgado por el Emperador. Le voy a asignar un acto de fe. Los sistemas de apoyo del atrio central fueron dañados en un reciente ataque terrorista de los seguidores de Tocara».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, Ihr seid schuldig, Tod und Leid verursacht zu haben; Ihr seid schuldig, Mitglieder des Hauses Chorda ermordet zu haben. Und doch sehe ich keine Verderbnis in Eurer Seele, und daher habe ich kein Recht, über Euch zu urteilen. Der Imperator wird über Euch urteilen. Ich gebe Euch einen Akt des Glaubens als Aufgabe. Die Unterstützungssysteme des zentralen Atriums wurden kürzlich bei einem Terroranschlag von Tocaras Anhängern beschädigt."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, Ihr seid schuldig, Tod und Leid verursacht zu haben; Ihr seid schuldig, Mitglieder des Hauses Chorda ermordet zu haben. Und doch sehe ich keine Verderbnis in Eurer Seele, und daher habe ich kein Recht, über Euch zu urteilen. Der Imperator wird über Euch urteilen. Ich gebe Euch einen Akt des Glaubens als Aufgabe. Die Unterstützungssysteme des zentralen Atriums wurden kürzlich bei einem Terroranschlag von Tocaras Anhängern beschädigt."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Hiéronymus Doloroso, vous êtes coupable de crimes ayant entraîné la mort et la souffrance de membres de la maison Chorda. Toutefois, je ne décèle en vous nulle corruption ; par conséquent, je n'ai aucun droit de vous juger. C'est donc l'Empereur lui-même qui s'en chargera. Je vous impose d'accomplir un acte de foi. Les systèmes de soutènement de l'Atrium central ont été récemment endommagés lors d'un attentat terroriste perpétré par les partisans de Tocara. »
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."

traits.locale_text: « Hiéronymus Doloroso, vous êtes coupable de crimes ayant entraîné la mort et la souffrance de membres de la maison Chorda. Toutefois, je ne décèle en vous nulle corruption ; par conséquent, je n'ai aucun droit de vous juger. C'est donc l'Empereur lui-même qui s'en chargera. Je vous impose d'accomplir un acte de foi. Les systèmes de soutènement de l'Atrium central ont été récemment endommagés lors d'un attentat terroriste perpétré par les partisans de Tocara. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, ölüm ve acı meydana getirmekten ve Chorda Hanesi mensuplarına suikast düzenlemekten suçlusun. Ancak ruhunda yozlaşma göremiyorum ve bu yüzden de seni yargılamaya hakkım yok. Seni İmparator yargılayacak. Sana inancını sınayacak bir vazife atıyorum. Merkez atriyumun destek sistemleri, Tocara'nın takipçilerinin yakın zamanda gerçekleştirdiği terörist saldırı sonucu hasar gördü."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, you are guilty of causing death and suffering, and you are guilty of assassinating members of House Chorda. Yet I see no corruption in your soul, and therefore I have no right to judge you. You will be judged by the Emperor. I am setting an act of faith for you to perform. The central atrium's support systems were damaged in a recent terrorist attack by Tocara's followers."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso, ölüm ve acı meydana getirmekten ve de Chorda Hanesi üyelerine suikast düzenlemekten suçlusun. Ancak ruhunda yozlaşma göremiyorum ve bu yüzden de seni yargılamaya hakkım yok. Seni İmparator yargılayacak. Sana inancını sınayacak bir vazife atıyorum. Merkez atriyumun destek sistemleri, Tocara'nın takipçilerinin yakın zamanda gerçekleştirdiği terörist saldırı sonucu hasar gördü."
traits.speaker: Chorda
